text.div:
LocationIdSearchParameter

Parameter _id:token

Searches based on the location uuid field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?_id={uuid}

ResourceLocation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesLocation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: LocationIdSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the location uuid field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?_id={uuid}
